title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 Mar 07 FR [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Friday, 07 March 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Friday, March 7 edition of The Alex Jones Show, David Knight guest-hosts, covering the latest in explosive conflicts and cover-ups. 

The heart and soul of the GOP is being fought for right now at the ongoing Conservative Political Action Conference as liberty-minded Republicans push back against the establishment. 

In other news, the CIA is coming after Congressional committee staffers who are investigating the agency's wrongdoings. 

And on the financial front, David breaks down the positive aspects of Bitcoin, particularly its free market leanings, as well as its vulnerabilities. 

Also on today's show, David reveals the never-before-seen interview with political commentator and editor-in-chief of The Daily Caller, Tucker Carlson, including his reaction to seeing footage of the collapse of WTC 7 for the very first time.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
